column2: Tindak Malaysia (2024), Laporan Pilihanraya Umum Dewan Undangan Negeri Sabah 1985, Suruhanjaya Pilihan Raya, New Straits Times 3rd April 1985.  Refer to 1985_Other_Sources for other sources

This file does not have the candidate's age information. USNO was removed from Barisan Nasional in 1984. Sabah Chinese Consolidated Pary (SCCP) opted not to contest. Following are the candidates who require further sex verification - Willie Chong Kui Shen (USNO), Tan Kit Sher (PBS), Fung Thiam Fu (DAP), Liew Chung Fatt (Bersih), and Lim Ting Yee (Independent). TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or omissions arising from the original data or its derivatives.
